      • displayPieCharts

        private void displayPieCharts()
        This method is called to display pie charts when requested by the user. It gets the list of all selected news makers from the SectionView and displays one pie chart per news maker. For each pie chart it needs to determine the media type(s) to display, the news content type to display, and the news metric to use for display.

        private void displayTextViews()
